column4: my method of veno security is that I enable and disable it over ssh with gconftool-2 -s -t bool /desktop/gnome/remote_access/enabled false and gconftool-2 -s -t bool /desktop/gnome/remote_access/enabled true ,
If you real paranoid and need more security you can connect through ssh as shown here: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=475839
